revised_title: Inequalities of the Kolmogorov Type for Second-Order Differential Expressions
tldr: This article discusses an integro-differential inequality involving a second-order differential expression. The authors establish a connection between the existence of the inequality and the Titchmarsh-Weyl function, showing that the best constant in the inequality is determined by the behavior of the function. The article provides a criterion for the validity of the inequality and examines various examples, giving estimates for the best constant and discussing cases of equality.
